Text: Wednesday, 25 September 2019, 17:53 Last update: about 7 hours ago  A man who lost €60,000 which he had invested in a failed plan to import gold from Sierra Leone has lost a case he filed to recover his investment.
Cause: a failed plan to import gold from Sierra Leone has lost a case he filed to recover his investment.
